meanings: (country) bumpkin, yokel, (Am) hillbilly, (Am) hayseed, (Am, inf) rube
have the earmarks of a peasant
have a bit of the country about one

vlive.korean: 우리 촌놈들이 엄청 출세했다. We've done well for a hillbilly. 듣기 View video V MOVIE : [REPLAY] 특집 <조인성> 배우를 만나다 LIVE '더킹쇼' Getting Personal With 'The King Show'
vlive.english: We've done well for a hillbilly.

vlive.korean: 이제와서 얘기하지만 저 촌놈이 아니에요. I'm not a not a country fellow. 듣기 View video B.I.G : B.I.G(비아이지) 데뷔 2주년 기념파티
vlive.english: I'm not a not a country fellow.

vlive.korean: 너 화순의 순박한 시골 촌놈이었구나. You were a simple countryside boy in Hwasun. 듣기 View video 모해 MOHAE : [미앤미]펜타곤 '이던' 편!

vlive.korean: 시골에서 올라온 부산 촌놈 장우영입니다. I'm Jang Wooyoung, a countryman from Busan. 듣기 View video 2PM : You’re my Rose Girl
vlive.english: I'm Jang Wooyoung, a countryman from Busan.

vlive.korean: 기차 안 타봤다고 사람이 어떻게 바보야. - 바보네. 촌놈. Why am I a dummy? - Such a hillbilly. 듣기 View video Cookat X Idol : [매떠여 EXO] 매떠여 시즌1- 본편 #7
vlive.english: Why am I a dummy? - Such a hillbilly.
